STARTING THE MULTI-PLAYER GAME IN GUI
----------------------

1. Run UI:
cargo run -- --gui 3 -p galaxy --state
1101100101111101100011110101100110011001100111101110001001000101101111101011101111000001001101101001110000
2>&1 | tee ui_output

2. Click the Galaxy to the right, and select player by clicking a Galaxy above
   (play as Defender) or below (play as Attacker)

3. Go to another shell.
   If you you clicked player above, run
     ./run_ai.sh 0
   Otherwise, run
     ./run_ai.sh 1

4. Click on the green numbers in front of your player to select resources.

5. Click the Galaxy to start the game
